adjectives.description: hazardable (comparative more hazardable, superlative most hazardable)

entries.meaning: Liable to chance or hazard; exposed to dangers; risky or uncertain.
examples: How to keep the corpse seven days from corruption by anointing and washing, without exenteration, were an hazardable piece of art, in our choicest practice

entries.meaning: Capable of being hazarded or risked.
